verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H1732"\w* end. \w A|strong="H1732"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

May \w the|strong="H5046"\w* Lord \w hear|strong="H5046"\w* thee \w in|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* day \w of|strong="H3027"\w* tribulation: may \w the|strong="H5046"\w* name \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H5608"\w* protect thee.

\w May|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* send thee help \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* sanctuary: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* defend thee \w out|strong="H5042"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Sion.

\w May|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H0369"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* mindful \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w all|strong="H1697"\w* thy sacrifices: \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w may|strong="H8085"\w* thy whole burnt offering \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w made|strong="H8085"\w* fat.

\w May|strong="H0776"\w* \w he|strong="H3318"\w* \w give|strong="H7760"\w* thee according \w to|strong="H0776"\w* thy own heart; \w and|strong="H0776"\w* confirm \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy counsels.

We \w will|strong="H1931"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H7797"\w* \w in|strong="H1368"\w* thy salvation; \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H1368"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* name \w of|strong="H1368"\w* \w our|strong="H3318"\w* God we \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H1931"\w* exalted.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* Lord fulfill \w all|strong="H7098"\w* thy petitions: \w now|strong="H0369"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* known \w that|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord hath saved \w his|strong="H5921"\w* anointed. \w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* hear \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* holy \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* salvation \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* right hand \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* powers.

\w Some|strong="H5315"\w* \w trust|strong="H0539"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* chariots, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w some|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* horses: \w but|strong="H7725"\w* \w we|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7725"\w* upon \w the|strong="H3068"\w* name \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* bound, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* fallen; \w but|strong="H4687"\w* we \w are|strong="H5869"\w* risen, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* set \w upright|strong="H3477"\w*. \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, save \w the|strong="H3068"\w* king: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hear \w us|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* day \w that|strong="H3068"\w* we \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* call upon thee.
